Jeffrey Epstein Case No.: 502006CF009454AXXXMB Dear Judge McSorley: We represent a witness in the above-referenced matter. It is kindly requested that a fifteen (15) minute or less special set hearing be scheduled on the enclosed Motion for Protective Order. Please have your judicial assistant contact my office to schedule said hearing. Thank you for your attention to this matter. Very truly yours, Stuart S. Mermelstein SSM/lr cc: Jack Goldberger, Esq. Lanna Leigh Belohlavek, Esq. 07/26/17 Page 47 Public Records Request No.: 17-295

text_blocks.content: HERMAN & MERMELSTEIN PA ATTORNEYS AT LAW
Stuart S. Mermelstein Tel 305-931-2200 Fax 305-931-0877 ssm@hermanlaw.com 18205 Biscayne Boulevard Suite 2218 Miami, Florida 33160 www.hermanlaw.com
Via Federal Express Honorable Sandra McSorley Palm Beach County Courthouse 205 North Dixie Highway Courtroom 11F West Palm Beach, Florida 33401
Re: State of Florida v. Jeffrey Epstein Case No.: 502006CF009454AXXXMB

We represent a witness in the above-referenced matter. It is kindly requested that a fifteen (15) minute or less special set hearing be scheduled on the enclosed Motion for Protective Order. Please have your judicial assistant contact my office to schedule said hearing.
Thank you for your attention to this matter.
Very truly yours, Stuart S. Mermelstein SSM/lr cc: Jack Goldberger, Esq. Lanna Leigh Belohlavek, Esq.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a letter from Stuart S. Mermelstein to Judge Sandra McSorley regarding a case involving Jeffrey Epstein. The letter is dated March 31, 2008, and is on Herman & Mermelstein PA letterhead. The document has been stamped with a date and time at the top, and has a page number and public records request number at the bottom.
